name: Cat's Adventure
description:
Join the cat on one endless odyssey, wandering the night's roof of New York.

Cat's Adventurer is an endless runner.

Controls :

[Space] : Jump.

[Left Clic] : To clic any buttons.

Credits :

Marie Rezzoug : Programmer

Gaëtan Fedrigoni : Game Artist

Music :

Slow motion by Lexin Music

Peaceful Garden by HarumachiMusic
